Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SG Deal Tracker

A complete sales tracking tool built with:
- Next.js 14 \(App Router\) + TypeScript
- Supabase \(PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage\)
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui

Features:
- Authentication with role-based access \(Admin/Founder\)
- Dashboard with pipeline stats and activity feed
- Prospects pipeline with deal stage management
- Products management for pricing and offerings
- Materials library with file upload and versioning
- Invite system for team management
- Automatic activity logging

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF
\)")
